short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Establish a secure data channel between two computers using a Chrome extension and transfer files/folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The application uses encryption to identify a specific computer in the internet and establish a direct communication channel. 

Data is exchanged with no speed cap and is impossible to monitor.

How it works:
- Generate a encrypted key and share it to the connecting device.
- Paste the encrypted key in the second computer.
- Two way file/folder transfer feature available.
